channel.title: Axoloti as hardware looper?
channel.description:
Hello, i´m new to this forum , has anybody managed to use axiloti as a hardware looper ? i would need just a few functions , midi clock sync, quarter note quantize for for start and stop , may be reverse , no loop storage , i would use it for the bass side of an 8 String Guitar Bass
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iqo8A7kvQIo&spfreload=10
thank you
Bernd Keul
